QuestData.Title: Portals of the Legion
QuestData.Description: Here it is - the Hand of Iruxos.$b$bGot it from one o' them Burning Blade leaders myself.$B$BPowerful thing! See, yeh use it on demon portals and they just disappear! Spooky magic, but these be desperate times...$b$bThe demons keep comin' at this rate, and my camp will get overrun before ya know it.$b$bHere ya go, now. Get on with it.
QuestData.RewardText: Aye, that'll buy us some time, $c.$b$bThank yeh.
